meanings.definition: A person who is idle or lazy.
meanings.sent1: The loafer spent the whole day lounging on the couch.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a loafer and help with the chores.
meanings.sent3: The loafer pretended to be too tired to do anything.
meanings.sent4: His brother called him a loafer for never helping out.
meanings.sent5: Being a loafer will not lead to success in life.

meanings.definition: A type of casual shoe without laces.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite loafers to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The loafer slipped on his comfortable shoes before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The loafer's shoe collection included various colors of loafers.
meanings.sent4: The classic loafer style never goes out of fashion.
meanings.sent5: Her brown loafers matched perfectly with her outfit.

meanings.sent1: He quickly put on his loafers before leaving the house.
meanings.sent2: The loafer chose loafers for their convenience.
meanings.sent3: The loafer's loafers were his favorite pair of shoes.
meanings.sent4: She admired the intricate design on the loafer she bought.
meanings.sent5: The loafer's loafers were comfortable for long walks.
